select u.*,e.name as empName,f.fleetName from t_system_user u left join t_system_employee e on u.empId = e.id LEFT JOIN t_system_fleet f ON u.fleetId = f.id WHERE u.loginName!='root'
and u.loginName like '%${userName}%'
and u.fleetId = #{fleetId}
order by u.crTime desc
select id,empId,loginName as text,isAdmin,remark,fleetId from t_system_user where isAdmin != 1 AND fleetId = #{id}
select id,empId,loginName as text,isAdmin,remark,fleetId from t_system_user where fleetId = #{id} AND remark = '调度员'
select id,empId,loginName as text,isAdmin,remark,fleetId from t_system_user where fleetId = #{id} AND remark = '审核员'
select id,empId,loginName,password,isAdmin,email,remark from t_system_user where flag = 1 and empId=#{empId}
select count(*) from t_system_user where id!=#{id} and loginName = #{loginName}
